segments.text: I'm observing the scene and can't help but feel a sense of unease.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on a two-step stool, but it looks incredibly unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Its legs are splayed outwards, and it appears to be tilted backwards.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm fearful that it could tip over at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's really stretching to reach that cookie jar, putting more pressure on the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A fall from that height onto a hard kitchen floor would be quite painful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What if he hits his head?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is standing close by, not helping to stabilize him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope he doesn't lose his balance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole setup makes me very nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a dangerous way to get a cookie, even if they are delicious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult is oblivious, which makes the situation even more concerning.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I worry about the potential consequences of this stunt.
segments.speaker: PAR
